titleStmt.title: The vnfortunate mother a tragedie. Never acted; but set downe according to the intention of the author Thomas Nabbes.
titleStmt.author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] O[kes] for Daniell Frere, and are to be sold at the signe of the Red Bull in Little Britaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
